title: How to Make a Homemade Teacher's Day Card

steps.title: Decide on the designs.
steps.content: Decide on the designs. In deciding you can level it up if you want the cards to be all the same or make some for your favorite teacher and some for the others or just make them the same.

steps.title: Prepare the materials.
steps.content: Prepare the materials. Get all the materials needed and then you can start. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Start cutting the cards or if you have a card already just design it.
steps.content: Start cutting the cards or if you have a card already just design it. If you want to make your own card shape you can use a white folder, be creative. Create the front of the card as previously designed, or just let your imagination flow and make it up as you go along. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Write the letter.
steps.content: Write the letter. Every card has a letter inside it so choose your own font design and color, if you want it to be printed it's ok but handwritten can be better because it expresses something and shows hard work. [3] X Research source

steps.title: After putting the text, now do the design.
steps.content: After putting the text, now do the design. Putting the design after the text is better because then you can fit the design around the writing, rather than trying to squeeze in the writing around the design. [4] X Research source

steps.title: After doing the design, let it dry and wait until it's finished.
steps.content: After doing the design, let it dry and wait until it's finished.
